text: Punam Barla (born Feb 10, 1995) is a member of the India women's national field hockey team who plays as a forward for the team. Hailing from Odisha she made her International debut in 2015.http://zeenews.india.com/sports/sports/hockey/indian-women-play-0-0-draw- with-spain-in-hockey-test-series_1547017.html ==References== Category:Living people Category:Munda people Category:Field hockey players from Odisha Category:Indian female field hockey players Category:Sportswomen from Odisha Category:21st-century Indian women Category:1995 births
title: Punam Barla
